meta.hint: Synonyms are words with the same meaning or almost the same meaning. Example - Dad and Father.
meta.question: Select the sentence with correct synonym.

content.word: The steps were freshly painted⸴ so we tried not to touch them.
content.description:
Which sentence has the same meaning?
The stairs were freshly painted, so we tried not to touch them.
content.extra: The steps were freshly painted⸴ so we tried not to touch them., The bricks were freshly painted⸴ so we tried not to touch them.

content.word: Did George's noisy dog wake you up this morning?
content.description:
Which sentence has the same meaning?
Did George's loud dog wake you up this morning?
content.extra: Did George's large dog wake you up this morning?, Did George's noisy dog wake you up this morning?

content.word: The circus will be in town for a week and will end⸴ on Sunday.
content.description:
Which sentence has the same meaning?
The circus will be in town for a week and will finish on Sunday.
content.extra: The circus will be in town for a week and will change on Sunday.,The circus will be in town for a week and will end⸴ on Sunday.

content.word: A beautiful hummingbird feeds on the nectar from flowers.
content.description:
Which sentence has the same meaning?
A pretty hummingbird feeds on the nectar from flowers.
content.extra: A beautiful hummingbird feeds on the nectar from flowers., An ugly hummingbird feeds on the nectar from flowers.

content.word: Mrs. Johnson closed her bedroom door and went to bed.
content.description:
Which sentence has the same meaning?
Mrs. Johnson shut her bedroom door and went to bed.
content.extra: Mrs. Johnson washed her bedroom door and went to bed., Mrs. Johnson closed her bedroom door and went to bed.
